ComicInfo.Penciller: James Fry III,Jim Valentino,Kyle Hotz,Ron Randall,Steve Leialoha,James Fry,Kyle Hotz,Jim Valentino,James Fry,Ron Randall,Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Summary: A anthology like story of four past Shadowhawks. The framing story was written by Kurt Busiek and each ancient Shadowhawk's story was written by a different writer. The comic can be read as a complete self-contained story or you can read each characters story separately.
ComicInfo.Title: A Journey through Shadows; The Shadow of Justice; Taka no Kage; L'Ombre avec le Faucon; Shadows in the Sand
ComicInfo.Writer: Alan Moore,Beau Smith,Kurt Busiek,Len Senecal,Stan Sakai,Kurt Busiek,Beau Smith,Stan Sakai,Len Senecal,Alan Moore
